readme:
# Good Morning (Dark Syntax theme for Atom)

Good Morning Dark is a theme designed with, style and functionality in mind. It combines striking color with an easy to identify color scheme.

![Screenshot](https://github.com/Pegladon/good-morning-dark-syntax-atom/blob/master/resources/images/html-looks.png?raw=true)

##Recommendations
The following are some recommendations of how you should use this theme, including what UI themes to use it with.
###Use [Atom-Material-UI](https://atom.io/themes/atom-material-ui)
Good-Morning-Dark recommends the use of the [Atom-Material-UI](https://atom.io/themes/atom-material-ui) theme. The theme compliments the vibrant nature of Good Morning dark syntax with a dark design and we recommend that you change the primary color to #32df00 to extend the green color scheme into the UI.

## Screenshots
The following a Screenshots of Good Morning Dark in action. Please note that some of these may not be  taken from the current version, however the version number is listed.
###Good Morning Dark with Atom-Material-UI V0.3
![Screenshot](https://github.com/Pegladon/good-morning-dark-syntax-atom/blob/master/resources/images/material-looks.png?raw=true)

###Javascript V0.3
![Screenshot](https://github.com/Pegladon/good-morning-dark-syntax-atom/blob/master/resources/images/js-looks.png?raw=true)
